title: The warmth and wisdom of mud buildings
description: "There are a lot of resources given by nature for free -- all we need is our sensitivity to see them and our creativity to use them," says architect Anna Heringer. Heringer uses low-tech materials like mud and bamboo to create structures from China to Switzerland, Bangladesh and beyond. Visit an awe-inspiring school, an elegant office and cozy social spaces -- all built from natural materials -- in this delightful talk.
author: Anna Heringer
keywords: TED, talks, architecture, design, engineering, sustainability, environment, materials
